text: Mardumi Saʙa'ro, ki az Jaman ʙudand dar istiqomatgohason iʙrate ʙud: Du ʙoƣ dostand, jake az coniʙi rost va digare az coniʙi cap. Az on ci Parvardigoraton ʙa sumo ruzi dodaast, ʙixured va sukri U ʙa coj ovared. Alloh sahri sumoro sahri xusu pokiza qaror dod va Parvardigor gunohi sumoro omurzandaast
